pl_trainer[source]

Example

{% raw %} 
class Args:
    def __init__(self):
        self.data_dir = '/content/data'
        self.min_rating = 4
        self.num_negative_samples = 99
        self.min_uc = 5
        self.min_sc = 5
        self.val_p = 0.2
        self.test_p = 0.2
        self.num_workers = 2
        self.normalize = False
        self.batch_size = 32
        self.seed = 42
        self.shuffle = True
        self.pin_memory = True
        self.drop_last = False
        self.split_type = 'stratified'

args = Args()

from recohut.datasets.movielens import ML1mDataModule

ds = ML1mDataModule(**args.__dict__)

ds.prepare_data()

Processing...

Turning into implicit ratings
Filtering triplets
Densifying index

Done!
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from recohut.models.nmf import NMF

model = NMF(n_items=ds.data.num_items, n_users=ds.data.num_users, embedding_dim=20)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
pl_trainer(model, ds, max_epochs=5)
